description: Includes all persons born in the United States with at least one parent who was born in Africa.
Includes all persons born in the United States with at least one parent who was born in Brazil.

group_name: Children of Haitian and Caribbean Immigrants
description: Includes all persons born in the United States with at least one parent who was born in Haiti or elsewhere in the Caribbean
Includes all persons born in the United States with at least one parent who was born in Europe

Includes agricultural workers and first-line supervisors of farming, fishing, and forestry workers. Other farmworker occupations within PCMRT's rubric cannot be identified using American Community Survey data.
Includes fishing and hunting workers, sailors, marine oilers, ship engineers, ship and boat captains and operators, marine engineers, and naval architects.

Includes aircraft pilots, flight engineers, flight attendants, air traffic controllers, airfield operations specialists, and aircraft mechanics and service technicians. Other civil aviation occupations within PCMRT's rubric cannot be identified using American Community Survey data.
